alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 2:11AM MST until March 11 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...In Utah, Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. In Wyoming, Southwest Wyoming. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Saturday. The heaviest snow is expected this afternoon and evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx. For winter road conditions from the Wyoming Department of Transportation, visit http://www.wyoroad.info or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley
